mapper.insert: insert into table_merge_data (admin_id, type, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzjz, is_delete) values (#{adminId}, #{type}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{battleNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ljxjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ljzjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.update: update table_merge_data set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, table_no = #{tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, battle_no = #{battleNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fit_no = #{fitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xjz = #{xjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zjz = #{zjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ljxjz = #{ljxjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ljzjz = #{ljzjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, admin_id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzjz, is_delete from table_merge_data where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete = 0
select id, admin_id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzjz, is_delete from table_merge_data

select id, admin_id, type, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzjz, is_delete from table_merge_data WHERE id != #{id} AND is_delete = 0 AND admin_id = #{adminId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
select ljzjz, ljxjz from table_merge_data WHERE is_delete = 0 AND admin_id = #{adminId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT fit_no, ljxjz FROM table_merge_data WHERE create_time >= #{startDate} AND create_time < #{endDate} AND admin_id = #{adminId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT fit_no, ljzjz FROM table_merge_data WHERE create_time >= #{startDate} AND create_time < #{endDate} AND admin_id = #{adminId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
